SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Interface NetworkPlug

All Known Implementing Classes:
NetworkServerSocket, ServerRMI
public interface NetworkPlug
The NetworkPlug interface defines the methods that are used for network communication in the game. These methods are called by the NetworkHandler class, which is the class that manages the network connections. When something happens in the game and this should be notified in a broadcast way, NetworkHandler call the methods for all the different types of connection protocols. It includes methods for finalizing the number of players, starting the game, refreshing users, sending placed root cards and objective cards, sending hands and secret objective cards, sending placed cards, sending drawn cards, and sending end game signals. It is used by the server to communicate with the clients with different types of network connections. Each connection protocol will implement this interface, to send messages to the clients broadcast. Currently, the implemented connections protocols are 1. Socket connection 2. RMI connection

  • Method Details

    • finalizingNumberOfPlayers

      void finalizingNumberOfPlayers()
      Finalizes the number of players in the game. It communicates to the clients that the number of players is set. All players allowed to join the game receive a stopWaiting message, the others not allowed to play should be cancelled from the connection list, and this should be notified to the clients.

    • refreshUsers

      void refreshUsers()
      Refreshes the list of users. Send a hashmap with the players and their colors to all clients.

    • gameIsStarting

      void gameIsStarting()
      Communicates to the clients that the game is starting. The message should be broadcast to all clients. It should notify the Common Card on Table (2 gold cards, 2 resource card, 1 gold card on deck, 1 resource card on deck). It should notify the personal starting card for each player.

    • fetchReceivers

      ArrayList<String> fetchReceivers(String message)
      Fetches the receivers of the message.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to send.
      Returns:
      The list of nicknames of the players across connections who should receive the message.

    • sendingChatMessage

      void sendingChatMessage(String sender, String message, ArrayList<String> receivers)
      Sends a chat message to players checking tags.
      Parameters:
      sender - The nickname of the player who sent the message.
      message - The message sent by the player.
      receivers - The list of nicknames of the players across connectios who should receive the message.

    • sendingPlacedRootCardAndWhenCompleteObjectiveCards

      void sendingPlacedRootCardAndWhenCompleteObjectiveCards(String nickname, boolean side, int cardId, boolean allWithRootCardPlaced)
      Sends the placed root card broadcast to all client. If all players have placed their root card, and thus @param allWithRootCardPlaced is true, you notify the common Objectives cards. Also with unicast message you notify the secret objective cards that the player can choose.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player.
      side - The side of the card.
      cardId - The id of the card.
      allWithRootCardPlaced - A boolean indicating whether all players have placed their root cards.

    • sendingHandsAndWhenSecretObjectiveCardsCompleteStartGameFlow

      void sendingHandsAndWhenSecretObjectiveCardsCompleteStartGameFlow(String nickname, boolean allWithSecretObjectiveCardChosen)
      Sends the hands and secret objective cards.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player.
      allWithSecretObjectiveCardChosen - A boolean indicating whether all players have chosen their secret objective cards.

    • sendPlacedCard

      void sendPlacedCard(String nickname, int cardId, Point position, boolean side)
      Sends the placed card. Broadcast to all clients. It should notify the card placed by the player, the position, and the side. Also with methods from controller you should get the new points and the new resources of the player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player.
      cardId - The id of the card.
      position - The position of the card.
      side - The side of the card.

    • sendDrawnCard

      void sendDrawnCard(String nickname, Integer newCardId, Kingdom headDeck, boolean gold, int onTableOrDeck)
      Sends the drawn card. Broadcast to all clients. It should notify the card drawn by the player, the head deck, and whether the card is gold or not.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player.
      newCardId - The id of the new card.
      headDeck - The head deck.
      gold - A boolean indicating whether the card is gold.
      onTableOrDeck - An integer indicating whether the card is on the table or the deck.

    • sendEndGame

      void sendEndGame()
      Sends the end game signal. Broadcast to all clients. With controller methods, you should get the extra points and the ranking of the players.

    • disconnectAll

      void disconnectAll()
      This method is used to disconnect all clients from a specific network interface. It should be implemented by each network interface to handle the disconnection process according to its specific protocol.

    • notifyTurn

      void notifyTurn()
      This method is used to notify all connected clients about the current turn. It should be implemented by each network interface to handle the notification process according to its specific protocol.

    • loadGame

      void loadGame(GameMaster game)
      This method is used to load a game from a save file. It should be implemented by each network interface to handle the loading process according to its specific protocol.
      Parameters:
      game - The game to load.
